      • ReadErrors

        java.util.BitSet ReadErrors()
        Read all alarms one bits pr. alarm. CMD: 13
        Returns:
        Alarms Bit 0: Temperatur Bit 1: Moisture Bit 2: Waterlevel to high Bit 3: Water pump error ......

      • ResetError

        boolean ResetError(int errorNum)
        Reset one alarm CMD: 14
        Parameters:
        errorNum -
        Returns:
        Done

      • GetStatus

        byte[] GetStatus()
        Get all values as a byte array CMD: 15
        Returns:
        All values 1: temp inside greenhouse [celcius] 2. temp outside greenhouse [celcius] 3: moisture [0 - 100 %] 4: waterlevel [0 - 25 cm] 5: red ligth level [0 - 100] 6: blue light level [0 - 100] 7: fan level [0, 1, 2] 8: water pump state [ON,OFF] 9: Fertiliser pump state 10: CO2 valve state 11: Temperature setpoint 12: Moisture setpoint 13 - 20: NO 21 - 24: All alarms 25 - 99: AUX

      • SetFanSpeed

        boolean SetFanSpeed(int speed)
        Set fan speed CMD 16
        Parameters:
        speed - = {0,1,2} (OFF, LOW, HIGH)
        Returns:
        true if processed
